rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with ample space and natural light, designed to facilitate easy movement and a grand display of colonial aesthetics.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An expansive living room featuring traditional Colonial decor with modern amenities, ensuring comfortable seating and ambient lighting. Large windows to promote natural ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A dining room set adjacent to the living room, designed for formal meals and social gatherings, with sufficient lighting and seating arrangements.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A functional kitchen area with Colonial design elements, incorporating modern appliances. The layout ensures an efficient workflow as per Vastu recommendations by positioning the cooking area in a favorable direction.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: A guest room with ample space and colonial detailing, complete with a balcony to ensure privacy and access to natural light as per design guidelines.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A grand Colonial entrance designed to be inviting while providing security. It incorporates a vestibule area for weather protection.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Separate balcony areas designed to offer private outdoor space adjoining both the guest room and master bedroom, ensuring ample natural light and ventilation.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: A dedicated service entrance for utilities and staff, keeping it separate from main living areas to maintain privacy and ease of access in accordance with local building norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom featuring Colonial-style design elements, an attached balcony for privacy and natural ventilation, and ample storage space.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Another comfortable master bedroom with colonial aesthetics, featuring a dedicated balcony to ensure personal relaxation and adherence to Vastu principles for restful energy.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: A functional additional bedroom designed with colonial decor, ensuring sufficient natural light through strategically placed windows and a small balcony.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact yet well-appointed bathroom area designed to serve the first floor, with efficient plumbing layouts as per local norms.

openings.name: Staircase Access
openings.description: A centrally located staircase ensuring smooth movement between floors and easy access for both residents and visitors, aligning with safety norms.

openings.name: Balcony (Master Bedroom 1)
openings.description: A spacious balcony adjoining Master Bedroom 1 providing privacy, ventilation, and an outdoor view.

openings.name: Balcony (Master Bedroom 2)
openings.description: A balcony adjoining Master Bedroom 2 offering a private space for relaxation and adherence to Vastu principles.

openings.name: Balcony (Additional Bedroom)
openings.description: A smaller balcony providing additional outdoor access, designed in a Colonial style for aesthetic continuity.
